A.name: Агент казначейства
A.caption: Агент казначейства
A.formula: select AGENT_ID from TREAS where ID=@TREAS_ID ::bigint

A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select coalesce(regexp_replace(max(lpad(docnumb,80,' ')), '[^0-9]', '', 'g')::int+1,1) from @TABLENAME where doctypeid=@DOCTYPEID and cid=0

A.caption: Префикс
A.formula: date_part('year', now())

A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select coalesce(regexp_replace(max(lpad(docnumb,80,' ')), '[^0-9]', '', 'g') ::bigint+1,1) from @TABLENAME where docpref = @DOCPREF and cid=0

A.name: Имя файла
A.caption: Имя файла
A.formula: select f.filename from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID

A.name: Размер файла
A.caption: Размер файла
A.formula: select f.size from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID

A.name: Дата загрузки файла
A.caption: Дата загрузки файла
A.formula: select f.docdate from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID

A.name: Настройки фильтра
A.formula: case when @FILTER = 'false' then null else (select b.filterinfo from configcolumnsbuff b where b.id = @ID) end

A.name: Дата постановки на учет в ФНС
A.caption: Дата ФНС

A.name: Тип
A.caption: Тип
A.formula: select u.classnode from units u where u.id = @UNITID

AI.name: Текстовый файл с полями фиксированной длины

A.formula: select coalesce(max(position)+1,1) from conceptitems where conceptid=@CONCEPTID and hid is null and @HID is null or hid=@HID and cid=0

A.name: Тип элемента
A.caption: Тип элемента
A.formula: P_SYSTEM_CONCEPTITEMS_GET_TYPE(@CONCEPTID, @HID, @ATTR)
select conceptid from conv where id=@CONVID

A.name: Порядок
A.caption: Порядок
A.formula: select coalesce(max(position)+1,1) from convacts where convid=@CONVID and hid is null and @HID is null or hid=@HID and cid=0

A.name: Таблица формата
A.caption: Таблица формата
A.formula: select min(ci.id) from conv c, conceptitems ci where c.id=@CONVID and c.conceptid = ci.conceptid and ci.cid=0

A.name: Наименование
A.caption: Наименование
A.query: select upper(tablename) as id, (select coalesce(upper(tablename)||' - '||max(m.name),upper(tablename)) from metaclass m where m.classnode='TABLE' and m.code=upper(tablename)) as code from pg_tables where schemaname = 'public' and @CONVUNITTYPE = 'table' union all select upper(p.proname) as id, (select coalesce(upper(p.proname)||' - '||max(m.name),upper(p.proname)) from metaclass m, metaclassprops mp where m.classnode='ACTION' and m.id = mp.metaclassid and mp.propnode='procedure' and lower(mp.strvalue)=p.proname) as code from pg_proc p, pg_namespace s where p.pronamespace = s.oid and s.nspname='public' and @CONVUNITTYPE = 'procedure'

A.formula: select a.convid from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID
select n.conceptid from conv n, convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID and a.convid=n.id
select ''||a.position||'.'||@CODE from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID

A.name: Внешний ключ
A.caption: Найти индентификатор по значению внешнего ключа

A.name: Идентификатор
A.caption: Идентификатор
A.formula: select coalesce(max(numb)+1,1)::int from convloads where convid=@CONVID and cid=0
select c.conceptid from convloads l, conv c where l.id=@CONVLOADID and l.convid = c.id
select convid from convloads where id=@CONVLOADID

A.name: Порядок
A.caption: Порядок
A.formula: select a.position from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID
select lpad(@POSITION ::text,5,' ')||'.'||c.code||' ['||lpad(a.position ::text,2,' ')||'.'||a.convunit||']' from convacts a, conceptitems c where a.conceptitemid = c.id and a.id=@CONVACTID

A.name: Способ выполнения
A.caption: Способ выполнения
A.formula: select a.convaction from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID
select convactid from convloadacts where id=@CONVLOADACTID

A.name: Порядок
A.caption: Порядок
A.formula: select p.position from convactparams p where p.id = @CONVACTPARAMID

A.name: Наименование
A.caption: Наименование
A.formula: select p.name from convactparams p where p.id = @CONVACTPARAMID

A.name: Ключ поиска записи
A.caption: Входит в ключ поиска записи
A.formula: select replace(replace(replace(replace(p.value_key::text,'{',''),'}',''),'f','Нет'),'t','Да') from convactparams p where p.id = @CONVACTPARAMID

A.name: Код БКД
A.caption: Код БКД
A.formula: select p_get_bkd_code( @ID ::bigint )

A.name: Полный адрес
A.caption: Полный адрес
A.formula: select p_get_Geo_fullname(@GEO_ID ::bigint )

A.name: Полный адрес
A.caption: Полный адрес
A.formula: select p_get_geo_fullname(@GEO_ID ::bigint )

A.name: Полный адрес
A.caption: Полный адрес
A.formula: select p_get_geo_fullname(@ID ::bigint )

A.name: Полный адрес
A.caption: Полный адрес
A.formula: select p_get_geo_fullname(@GEO_ID ::bigint )

A.name: Агент казначейства
A.caption: Агент казначейства
A.formula: select AGENT_ID from TREAS where ID=@TREAS_ID ::bigint

Файлы Годовых заданий по сбору доходов

A.name: Номер документа
A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select coalesce( max(DOCNUMB ::bigint) +1,1) from @TABLENAME where DOCPREF='ГЗД'

A.name: Фаил загружен
A.caption: Фаил загружен
A.formula: select p_yes_no(count(f.id)) s from BUDGET_PLAN_FILE f where f.BUDGET_PLAN_ID =@ID ::bigint

A.name: Годовое задание
A.caption: Годовое задание

A.caption: 1 квартал

A.formula: select sum( coalesce(SUM_P_2,0) ) from BUDGET_PLAN_SPC where BUDGET_PLAN_ID=@ID ::bigint

A.name: 4 квартал
A.caption: 4 квартал
A.formula: select sum( coalesce(SUM_P_4,0) ) from BUDGET_PLAN_SPC where BUDGET_PLAN_ID=@ID ::bigint

A.formula: select p_bps_fact_sum_bkd(@ID ::bigint,2)

A.formula: select p_bps_fact_sum_bkd(@ID ::bigint,3)

A.formula: select p_bps_fact_sum_bkd(@ID ::bigint,4)

A.name: Пользователь
A.caption: Пользователь
A.formula: select name from users where id=@UID ::bigint

A.name: Дата
A.caption: Дата
A.formula: select tim from BUDGET_PLAN_STATUS where id=@ID

A.name: Номер документа
A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select coalesce( max(DOCNUMB ::bigint) +1,1) from @TABLENAME where DOCPREF='ФПД'

A.name: Фаил загружен
A.caption: Фаил загружен
A.formula: select p_yes_no(count(f.id)) s from BUDGET_INCOM_FILE f where f.BUDGET_INCOM_ID =@ID ::bigint

A.name: С начала года
A.caption: С начала года
A.formula: select sum(coalesce(SUM_I3_FED,0)) from BUDGET_INCOM_SPC where BUDGET_INCOM_ID=@ID ::bigint

A.name: В текущем месяце
A.caption: В текущем месяце
A.formula: select sum( coalesce(SUM_I3_FED_MES,0)) from BUDGET_INCOM_SPC where BUDGET_INCOM_ID=@ID ::bigint

A.name: Всего
A.caption: Всего
A.formula: select sum( coalesce(SUM_I3_FED,0)+coalesce(SUM_I3_FED_MES,0) ) from BUDGET_INCOM_SPC where BUDGET_INCOM_ID=@ID ::bigint

A.name: Поступлений с начала года
A.caption: Поступлений с начала года
A.formula: select sum(coalesce(SUM_I1_FED,0)) from BUDGET_INCOM_SPC where BUDGET_INCOM_ID=@ID ::bigint

A.name: В текущем месяце
A.caption: В текущем месяце
A.formula: select sum(coalesce(SUM_I1_FED_MES,0)) from BUDGET_INCOM_SPC where BUDGET_INCOM_ID=@ID ::bigint

A.name: Всего
A.caption: Всего
A.formula: select sum( coalesce(SUM_I1_FED,0)+coalesce(SUM_I1_FED_MES,0) ) from BUDGET_INCOM_SPC where BUDGET_INCOM_ID=@ID ::bigint

A.name: Сумма
A.caption: Сумма
A.formula: select sum( coalesce(SUM_I3_FED,0)+coalesce( SUM_I3_FED_MES,0)+coalesce(SUM_I1_FED,0) +coalesce( SUM_I1_FED_MES,0) ) from BUDGET_INCOM_SPC where BUDGET_INCOM_ID=@ID ::bigint

A.name: Код БКД
A.caption: Код БКД
A.formula: select p_get_bkd_name( @BKD_ID ::bigint )

A.name: Итого
A.caption: Итого
A.formula: select sum( coalesce(SUM_I3_FED,0)+coalesce( SUM_I3_FED_MES,0) + coalesce(SUM_I1_FED,0) + coalesce( SUM_I1_FED_MES,0) ) from BUDGET_INCOM_SPC where ID=@ID ::bigint

TABLE.name: Фактические поступления-итоги по БКД за год
TABLE.query: select spc_bkd.ID, spc_bkd.HID, spc_bkd.LID, spc_bkd.CID, spc_bkd.UID, spc_bkd.TIM, spc_bkd.ID as budget_incom_spc_id, f.docdate , sum (coalesce(f.sum_transf,0) ) sum_transf, sum (coalesce(f.sum_in,0) ) sum_in, sum (coalesce(f.sum_transf,0)+coalesce(f.sum_in,0) ) sum_all from( SELECT doc.docdate, ( SELECT sum(coalesce(s.SUM_I1_FED_MES,0) ) FROM budget_incom d, budget_incom_spc s WHERE s.budget_incom_id=d.id and doc.docdate >= d.docdate and spc.bkd_id = s.bkd_id and d.agent_id = doc.agent_id and d.status = '4' ) as sum_transf, ( SELECT sum(coalesce(s.SUM_I3_FED_MES,0) ) FROM budget_incom d, budget_incom_spc s WHERE s.budget_incom_id=d.id and doc.docdate >= d.docdate and spc.bkd_id =s.bkd_id and d.agent_id=doc.agent_id and d.status = '4' ) as sum_in, doc.agent_id, spc.bkd_id, spc.budget_incom_id FROM budget_incom doc, budget_incom_spc spc WHERE spc.budget_incom_id=doc.id ) f , budget_incom bkd, budget_incom_spc spc_bkd where bkd.id=spc_bkd.budget_incom_id and f.bkd_id = spc_bkd.bkd_id /*and bkd.status = '4'*/ and EXTRACT(YEAR from f.docdate) = EXTRACT(YEAR from bkd.docdate ) group by spc_bkd.ID, spc_bkd.HID, spc_bkd.LID, spc_bkd.CID, spc_bkd.UID, spc_bkd.TIM, f.docdate, f.bkd_id order by f.docdate, f.bkd_id

TABLE.name: Фактические поступления-итоги по ФКУ за год
TABLE.query: select spc_bkd.ID, spc_bkd.HID, spc_bkd.LID, spc_bkd.CID, spc_bkd.UID, spc_bkd.TIM, spc_bkd.ID as budget_incom_spc_id, f.docdate , sum (coalesce(f.sum_transf,0) ) sum_transf, sum (coalesce(f.sum_in,0) ) sum_in, sum (coalesce(f.sum_transf,0)+coalesce(f.sum_in,0) ) sum_all from( SELECT doc.docdate, ( SELECT sum( coalesce(s.SUM_I1_FED_MES,0)) FROM budget_incom d, budget_incom_spc s WHERE s.budget_incom_id=d.id and doc.docdate >= d.docdate and d.agent_id = doc.agent_id and d.status = '4' ) as sum_transf, ( SELECT sum(coalesce(s.SUM_I3_FED_MES,0)) FROM budget_incom d, budget_incom_spc s WHERE s.budget_incom_id=d.id and doc.docdate >= d.docdate and d.agent_id=doc.agent_id and d.status = '4' ) as sum_in, doc.agent_id, spc.bkd_id, spc.budget_incom_id FROM budget_incom doc, budget_incom_spc spc WHERE spc.budget_incom_id=doc.id ) f , budget_incom bkd, budget_incom_spc spc_bkd where bkd.id=spc_bkd.budget_incom_id and f.agent_id = bkd.agent_id /*and bkd.status = '4'*/ and EXTRACT(YEAR from f.docdate) = EXTRACT(YEAR from bkd.docdate ) group by spc_bkd.ID, spc_bkd.HID, spc_bkd.LID, spc_bkd.CID, spc_bkd.UID, spc_bkd.TIM, f.docdate order by f.docdate

COMMENT.name: Всего по БКД и ФКУ p_resipt_profit_total_bkd_fku

TABLE.name: Фактические поступления-Всего по БКД и ФКУ
TABLE.query: select distinct spc_bkd.ID, spc_bkd.HID, spc_bkd.LID, spc_bkd.CID, spc_bkd.UID, spc_bkd.TIM, spc_bkd.ID as budget_incom_spc_id, r.val3, r.val4, r.val5, r.val6, r.val7, r.val8, r.val9, r.val10, r.val11, r.val12, r.val13 from( SELECT doc.docdate, doc.agent_id, spc.bkd_id, spc.budget_incom_id FROM budget_incom doc, budget_incom_spc spc WHERE spc.budget_incom_id=doc.id ) f , budget_incom bkd, budget_incom_spc spc_bkd, p_resipt_profit_total_bkd_fku(bkd.docdate,bkd.agent_id,spc_bkd.bkd_id) r where bkd.id = spc_bkd.budget_incom_id and f.agent_id = bkd.agent_id and f.bkd_id = spc_bkd.bkd_id
